mapper.insert: insert into carts(id, user_id, product_id, quantity, added_time) values( null, #{ loginUserId }, #{ productId }, #{ quantity }, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: select * from product_cart_view where user_id = #{ loginUserId }
select * from carts where product_id = #{ productId }
mapper.delete: delete from carts where product_id = #{ productId } and user_id = #{ loginUserId }
